problem.p: A cylinder of mass \(M\) and radius \(R\) is free to rotate around a frictionless axle through its center. The axle is connected to a spring of spring constant \(k\). The surface of the floor is rough enough that the cylinder always rolls without slipping. The spring is displaced a distance \(x_0\) from the springs unstretched position, and then released. The cylinder starts rolling back and forth.
a) What is the frequency of oscillations? Use some combination of the variables k, M, R, and x0 in your answer.
b) What is the maximum speed of the cylinder? Use the variables x0, k, & M in your answer.
